page.title: 06Chesterton School
page.content: There is one Church of England primary school in the area at Chesterton which has approximately 70 children between 5 and 11 years, taught by 3 full time teachers.It is the council appointed primary school for the villages in this area,although a small proportion of the children of this age group are educated at Kirtling -ton C.of E. Primary School and a similar number at private schools in Oxford.Most older children undergo secondary education at Bicester whilst a few go to schools at Woodstock or Oxford.For further education pupils attend colleges and polytechnics in Banbury or Oxford.Adults can attend further education classes in Bicester, Oxford etc.
